module: Module-level comment: The `Computer_System_Audio_Subsystem_Audio_PLL_audio_pll` module generates a 12.288135 MHz clock from a 50.0 MHz reference clock using an `altera_pll` instance. This module handles input signals `refclk` (reference clock) and `rst` (reset), and outputs `outclk_0` (generated clock) and `locked` (lock status). Specific PLL parameters are set for optimal performance in audio applications, with all configurations directly managed within the `altera_pll` instantiation.
